The Freelance Rate Calculator is your go-to tool for figuring out how much to charge as a freelancer or contract worker. Whether you're just starting out or have been in the game for years, this extension helps you make sure you're covering your expenses and earning what you deserve.

ðŸ•’ Annual Billable Hours
Calculate your working hours by factoring in holidays and personal/sick days. Get a realistic view of your available billable hours.

ðŸ’¸ Tax Rate Calculation
Estimate your post-tax hourly rate by entering your tax rate. Know exactly how much youâ€™ll take home.

ðŸ”„ Real-Time Updates
See your total expenses and estimated rates update instantly. Adjust inputs and watch your calculations change on the fly.

ðŸ“ˆ Clear and Detailed Results
Receive a breakdown of your estimated minimum required yearly income, working hours per year, billable hours per year, and both pre-tax and post-tax hourly rates.
